column4: got a question concerning the options of my screen refresh rate: i got 2 options here. 60 or 75 Mhz. can i damage something if i make a wrong decision or are the choices harmless?
do not know what is LCD and CRT.
lcd is very very flat, and not very deep, CRT are cathode ray tube screens like your tv, they ussually are 15cm deep or deeper
